title: Textile, 1991-90-3, 1962–63
medium:
Medium: acetate and viscose
Technique: plain weave with machine embroidery
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 80 x 93 cm (31 1/2 x 36 5/8 in.)
Repeat H: 100 cm (39 3/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Marion K. Morgan and from General Acquisitions Endowment, Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, and Eleanor G. Hewitt Funds
description: Machine embroidered concentric circles and circles within a square using a fuzzy yarn in pink, yellow, green, and orange on a bright yellow background.
